スエズ運河より地中海方面へ\n進出！周辺海域を制圧しつつ\nマルタ島への増援輸送:
Advance from the Suez
Canal to the
Mediterranean! Conduct
a reinforcement transport
operation to Malta while
controlling the surrounding
waters! Fleet, sortie!
地中海の要衝マルタ島へ基地\n航空隊を進出し、これと協同\nして地中海の敵港湾拠:
Advance land-based air
forces to Malta, a key point
in the Mediterranean, and
work with them to destroy
enemy port bases and the
main enemy surface fleet in
the Mediterranean!
ジブラルタル沖/地中海/マルタ島沖: Coast off Gibraltar/Mediterranean Sea/Coast off Malta
ジブラルタル沖/地中海/\nマルタ島沖:
Coast off Gibraltar/Mediterranean
Sea/Coast off Malta
地中海の戦いの生命線となる\nマルタ島への本格的増援輸送\n作戦、「ペデスタル作:
We are launching Operation
Pedestal, a full-scale
reinforcement transport
operation to Malta, the
lifeline of the Mediterranean
war! Fleet, sortie!
これよりスエズ運河から、地中海に！:
We're now going entering the
Mediterranean Sea from the Suez Canal!
付近に敵増援部隊を認む。警戒を厳に！:
We have enemy reinforcements
in the vicinity. Remain vigilant!
艦隊は、紅海よりスエズ運河に！:
The Fleet is going from the
Red Sea to the Suez Canal!
Force H、出撃する! 敵港湾拠点を叩き、敵地中海\n艦隊主力第1及び第2艦:
Force H, sortie! Strike the enemy harbor point,
and search and destroy the enemy's
     1st and 2nd Mediterranean Fleets!
対空、対水上警戒を厳とせよ！\n合戦用意！ 全艦隊、戦闘態勢をとれ！:
Anti-aircraft and anti-surface alert! Prepare
for battle! All ships, take battle stations!
敵影見ず…されど敵艦隊らしき通信を傍受せり。\n警戒を厳に。周辺海域捜索の要を認:
No sign of the enemy, but we have intercepted a
transmission that appears to be from them.
Remain vigilant. We must search the surroundings!
最前線マルタ島です。周辺警戒を厳に！:
This is Malta, the front line.
Stay alert!
「ペデスタル作戦」発動！艦隊、前進！\n対潜、対空、対水上見張りを厳とせよ！:
Operation Pedestal, start! Fleet, advance!
Maintain strict anti-submarine, anti-aircraft,
     and anti-surface surveillance!
第10潜水戦隊、出撃！\n敵水上艦隊を洋上で捕捉、これを撃滅せよ！:
10th Submarine Squadron, sortie!
Trap the enemy surface fleet at sea
     and destroy it!
艦隊、決戦準備、よし！\n地中海の水平線に……勝利を刻め！:
Fleet, battle stations.
Carve victory... on the Mediterranean horizon!
